name: nextcloud-talk
description: Nextcloud Talk (Spreed) is a self-hosted communication platform with video, audio, chat, screen sharing, and WebRTC infrastructure, integrated directly into the Nextcloud stack.
features: Video conferencing: Host video calls with multiple participants using WebRTC technology.
Audio calls: Make voice-only calls for lower bandwidth usage or audio-focused meetings.
Screen sharing: Share your screen or specific windows with call participants.
Chat messaging: Send text messages, emojis, and files in conversation threads.
Group conversations: Create public or private chat rooms for team communication.
Mobile apps: Native iOS and Android apps for calls and messaging on the go.
Call recording: Record video meetings for later review or sharing with absent participants.
Virtual backgrounds: Blur or replace your background during video calls for privacy.
Breakout rooms: Split large meetings into smaller groups for focused discussions.
Lobby mode: Control meeting access by admitting participants from a waiting room.
File sharing: Share Nextcloud files directly in conversations with preview and download.
Nextcloud integration: Unified authentication and seamless integration with other Nextcloud apps.
